Action.description:
Union type of all supported actions. Actions can be discriminated by:
- 'template' property -> ReportAction
- 'command' property -> RunAction
- 'set' property -> UpdateConcernContextAction

AstGrepFilterConfig.description: Configuration for the ast-grep filter. Extracts AST nodes from source code using ast-grep's pattern syntax. Patterns look like actual code with metavariables ($VAR) for wildcards.

language.description: The language to parse the code as. Required for accurate AST parsing.

pattern.description: The pattern to match against. Can be a simple string pattern or an object with context and selector for precise matching.

type.description: Discriminant tag identifying this as an ast-grep filter.

AstGrepPatternObject.description: Pattern object for ast-grep with context and selector. Used for precise matching within specific AST structures.

context.description: Full code snippet providing context for parsing. This helps ast-grep understand the syntactic structure.

selector.description: AST node type to select from the matched context. Ensures precise targeting of specific syntax elements.

Check.description: A check defines filters to apply and actions to take when changes match.

actions.description: Actions to run when the check is triggered. Will run once per file that matches the check's filters.

filters.description: Filters to apply to the file content. Each filter processes the file and produces artifacts for comparison. If all filters produce a meaningful diff, the actions are triggered.

Concern.description: A concern represents a specific area of interest or domain in the project. Checksets can be attached to concerns to group related checks.

stakeholders.description: List of stakeholders associated with this concern.

DistillConfig.description: Root configuration interface for distill.yml files. Defines all the checksets for processing git diffs.

checksets.description: List of file checksets that define how to process different types of files.

concerns.description: Dictionary of concerns defined in the project. Keys are concern IDs.

FileCheckset.description: Files matching the glob pattern will have the checks applied to them.

checks.description: List of checks to apply to files matching the pattern.

concerns.description: List of concern IDs that this checkset is attached to.

include.description: Glob pattern for files to which this checkset applies. Uses minimatch syntax for pattern matching.

FilterConfig.description: Union type of all supported filter configurations. Each filter type has its own specific properties with the 'type' field as discriminant.

JqFilterConfig.description: Configuration for the jq filter. Uses the jq command-line tool to extract/transform JSON content.

query.description: The jq query expression to apply to JSON content. See https://jqlang.github.io/jq/manual/ for syntax reference.

type.description: Discriminant tag identifying this as a jq filter.

RegexFilterConfig.description: Configuration for the regex filter. Extracts content matching a regular expression pattern.

flags.description:
Optional regex flags to modify matching behavior. The 'g' (global) and 'm' (multiline) flags are always applied automatically.

Common flags:
- 'i': Case-insensitive matching
- 's': Dot matches newlines (dotAll mode)
- 'u': Unicode mode

pattern.description: The regular expression pattern to match. Uses JavaScript regex syntax.

type.description: Discriminant tag identifying this as a regex filter.

ReportAction.description: A "report" action produces a text report about the change. It can be routed many places, including to stdout or an API call (for example, a GitHub comment).

template.description: Handlebars template for the comment to produce. Accepts markdown, and receives a FilterResult as its evaluation context.

type.description: Discriminant for tagged union. Implied when 'template' is present.

urgency.description: Urgency of report. Higher values indicate more important/urgent reports. Reports are sorted by urgency (highest first) when output.

RunAction.description: A "run" action runs an arbitrary command that receives details about the change as environment variables.

args.description: If the command requires arguments, they can be evaluated here as Handlebars templates which receive a FilterResult as evaluation context.

command.description: Path to the command. Can be a string or an array of strings which will be evaluated as arguments to produce the command path.

env.description: If the default environment variables don't suffice, you can define new ones as Handlebars templates which receive a FilterResult as evaluation context.

type.description: Discriminant for tagged union. Implied when 'command' is present.

Stakeholder.description: A stakeholder interested in a set of concerns.

contactMethod.description: How to contact the stakeholder. Examples: "github-comment-mention", "github-reviewer-request", "github-assign", "webhook".

description.description: A description of the stakeholder's role or interest.

name.description: The name of the stakeholder (e.g. a team or person).

TsqFilterConfig.description: Configuration for the tsq (tree-sitter query) filter. Extracts AST nodes from source code using tree-sitter's S-expression query syntax. This enables language-aware code analysis for tracking changes to specific code constructs.

capture.description: Optional capture name to filter results. When specified, only nodes matching this capture name will be extracted. If omitted, all captures from the query will be included.

language.description:
Optional file extension to override language detection. By default, the language is detected from the file being processed. Use this when processing files with non-standard extensions.

Supported extensions: .js, .jsx, .mjs, .ts, .tsx, .py, .go, .java, .rs, .c, .h, .cpp, .cxx, .hpp, .json

query.description:
The tree-sitter query pattern using S-expression syntax. See https://tree-sitter.github.io/tree-sitter/using-parsers/queries for syntax reference.

Common patterns:
- `(node_type)

type.description: Discriminant tag identifying this as a tsq filter.

UpdateConcernContextAction.description: An action that updates the shared context of the concerns attached to the checkset.

set.description: Key-value pairs to set in the concern context. Values can be Handlebars templates which receive a FilterResult as evaluation context.

type.description: Discriminant for tagged union. Implied when 'set' is present.

XPathFilterConfig.description: Configuration for the xpath filter. Extracts nodes from XML/HTML content using XPath expressions.

expression.description: The XPath expression to evaluate against the XML/HTML content. See https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath/ for syntax reference.

namespaces.description: Optional namespace prefix mappings for XPath expressions. Maps prefix strings to namespace URI strings. Required when querying XML documents with namespaces.

type.description: Discriminant tag identifying this as an xpath filter.
